description: Planning a Mexican night? This tasty mince, tomato, bean and rice dish wonâ€™t disappoint, with a flavourful chilli mix giving it an authentic kick.
name: Mexican-inspired Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup jalapeno & chilli mix, coarsely chopped
420g no-added salt Mexican-style 3 bean mix, rinsed, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add mince and chilli powder, then cook for 3 minutes, stirring, or until browned.
Add tomatoes, chilli mix, rice and 1 1/2 cups cold water, then stir to combine. Bring to the boil. Cover with a lid, reduce heat to low and cook for 15 minutes or until rice is tender.
Stir through beans. Divide mixture among bowls, then serve topped with sour cream and coriander.
